name: Mainframe (Suri)
description:
Mainframe is a bullet-hell game made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 4 in June of 2019. The theme was Connect. Mainframe is about a system, the Mainframe, trying to connect other nearby systems to itself. 

Credits: Daniel Bizup

Extra Remix: The last two enemies are remixed from previous games. The Antivirus enemy uses the player sprite from my Antivirus game (unpublished) from a game jam in 2016. The Quatro enemy uses the AI from a game I worked on, Hue Will Die (published for the Global Game Jam 2017). The Quatro sprite was reworked to fit the art style of Mainframe.
